SELECT VM.VHC_NO ,MAX(IF(UL.COMPLETE_YN IS NULL, '', IF(UL.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', ''))) AS COMPLETE_YN ,DI.DVC_KIND ,DI.ORG_ID ,OM.ORG_DIV ,DI.INST_LOC ,DI.DVC_ID ,DI.DVC_IP ,DI.MNG_ID ,DI.REMARK ,VM.VHC_ID ,UL.RSV_ID ,DI.FILE_NM FROM BMS_DVC_INFO DI LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST VM ON DI.VHC_ID = VM.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_UPD_LOG UL ON DI.MNG_ID = UL.MNG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ORG_MST OM ON DI.ORG_ID = OM.ORG_ID
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || COMPLETE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND COMPLETE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DVC_KIND LIKE CONCAT('%',#{DVC_KIND},'%')
AND DI.DVC_KIND = #{DVC_KIND}
GROUP BY DI.MNG_ID ORDER BY VM.VHC_NO ASC, DI.DVC_KIND ASC
SELECT VM.VHC_NO ,UL.COMPLETE_YN FROM BMS_VHC_MST VM LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO DI ON VM.VHC_ID = DI.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_UPD_LOG UL ON DI.MNG_ID = UL.MNG_ID
